hover.description: Use as the hover state border color for any branded element, like color-coded labels, banners, etc.

default.description: Use as the default border color for any branded element, like color-coded labels, banners, etc.

clicked.description: Use as the clicked state border color for any branded element, like color-coded labels, banners, etc.

default.description: Use as the default color for text placed on a brand-colored background.

hover.description: Use as the hover state for elements that have a branded background color

clicked.description: Use as the clicked state for elements that have a brand background color

default.description: Use this color for elements that you want to reinforce your brand
